storm.asynchbase.bolt.mapper

Class AsyncHBaseMapper

  • java.lang.Object
    • storm.asynchbase.bolt.mapper.AsyncHBaseMapper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, IAsyncHBaseMapper

    public class AsyncHBaseMapper
extends java.lang.Object
implements IAsyncHBaseMapper
    This class holds several fields mappers ( RPC configuration ) by name

      • addFieldMapper

        public AsyncHBaseMapper addFieldMapper(java.lang.String name,
                              IAsyncHBaseFieldMapper asyncHBaseFieldMapper)
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the RPC.
        Note: use unique names.
        asyncHBaseFieldMapper - Field mapper used to map tuple fields to RPC settings.
        Returns:
        This so you can do method chaining.

      • getFieldMappers

        public java.util.List<IAsyncHBaseFieldMapper> getFieldMappers(java.util.List<java.lang.String> names)
        Specified by:
        getFieldMappers in interface IAsyncHBaseMapper
        Parameters:
        names - Names of the RPC to execute. If null it will return all available mappers.
        Returns:
        List of mappers/RPCs to execute.

      • prepare

        public void prepare(java.util.Map conf)

        This method will initialize all mappers and serializers.
        It will typically has to be called by the bolt prepare method.

        Specified by:
        prepare in interface IAsyncHBaseMapper
        Parameters:
        conf - Topology configuration.
